title: Canary deployment
summary: Release changes to a small subset of traffic to validate behavior before full rollout.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Integration changes can cause system-wide impact; canaries reduce blast radius.
whenToUse: You can route or segment traffic
You have good telemetry and rollback
whenNotToUse: You cannot control traffic segmentation at all

thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Define objective gates (error rate, latency, backlog) and automate rollback on failure.

complexity.rationale: Requires routing control and solid telemetry.
complexity.operationalDemand: Highâ€”needs strong monitoring and incident response.

realWorldExample.approach: Canary released a new handler version with automated rollback gates.
realWorldExample.outcome: Lower incident impact and faster safe release cadence.
